short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the following only on (switchedonuk.ignitiaschools.com) Webpages: (Select) (Copy) (Cut) (Paste) (Right-Click Context Menu)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Disables the ability to Copy and Paste on SwitchedOn (switchedonuk.ignitiaschools.com) Webpages. This is useful in Educational Institutes where Students are doing Online Learning and Copying/Pasting is not desirable.
